JobFullDesc: About the Role  As a member of the GSS DaaS team, you will have the opportunity to drive the analysis behind various product-related decisions at Uber. You will perform a range of activities demonstrating your analytical thought leadership and will be involved in leading multiple data-driven projects including, but not limited to :Design of KPI tracking systems for complex company-wide metrics across various Uber products and teams globallyPerforming analytical deep dives to drive product/strategy road-mapDesign of efficient analytical data marts that mimic product flow at scale What the Candidate Will DoApply expertise in statistical analysis, data mining and visualisation to own and deliver end to end analytical solution developmentTranslate analytical solution into actionable insights and recommendations for the technical and non-technical audience in a clear, concise and persuasive wayMaintain and continue to raise the bar for quality/efficiency of analytical solution deliveryFocus on long term improvements by building, maintaining, and documenting best practices within the team and seek continuous improvement opportunitiesLead vendor data analyst in project executionDo all that it takes to drive and deliver multiple analytical and data engineering projects to partner team across UberWhat the Candidate Will Need Out of box thinkingGreat at logic and deductionProactivenessGood Communication SkillsProblem solving skills, SQLPythonAnalytical thinking
